actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution directing the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct hearings to determine whether Federal safety standards for hang gliders are desirable and to determine the appropriate Federal agency to administer such standards.

summary.text: Directs the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct hearings to determine whether Federal safety standards for hang gliders are desirable and to determine the appropriate Federal agency to administer such standards.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to conduct hearings to determine whether Federal safety standards for hang gliders are desirable and to determine the appropriate Federal agency to administer such standards.
